ProductInfo.Features:
Simplified UI: Easy to find any app you wanted. My mom and I no longer have to learn how to use the tablet.
Pre-install educational apps for child to learn letter, words, number, sharps...in a fun way!
With bumper, the device is safe for dropping.
Support eBooks and audio books. Pre-loaded kindle and iStorybook.
Setting time limit or managing content and apps to ensure your children have a safe, healthy and fun journal with AGPTekAbot tablet.
ProductInfo.Name: AGPtek® 7" Kids Children Tablet PC Parental Control Function With Red & Yellow Bumper Unique UI 4GB Storage - Pre-installed Google Play, Educational & Reading Apps
